wol.name: wol

option.name: device
option.description: The name of the device to wake up

wol.deviceResponse_success: `{{device}}` has been sent a wake-on-lan packet
wol.deviceResponse_success_mac: `{{device}}` (`{{mac}}`) has been sent a wake-on-lan packet
wol.deviceResponse_actionfailed: Failed to send wake-on-lan packet to `{{device}}`
wol.deviceResponse_actionfailed_mac: Failed to send wake-on-lan packet to `{{device}}` (`{{mac}}`)

ping.name: ping

option.name: device
option.description: The name of the device to ping, leave empty to ping bot

ping.deviceResponse:
Unknown response
- Avg Ping: `{{avg}}`
- Max Ping: `{{max}}`
- Min Ping: `{{min}}`
- Packets lost: `{{packetLoss}}%`
ping.deviceResponse_true_true:
`{{host}}` is online.
- Avg Ping: `{{avg}}`
- Max Ping: `{{max}}`
- Min Ping: `{{min}}`
- Packets lost: `{{packetLoss}}%`
ping.deviceResponse_true_false:
Device is online.
- Avg Ping: `{{avg}}`
- Max Ping: `{{max}}`
- Min Ping: `{{min}}`
- Packets lost: `{{packetLoss}}%`
